aboutpara: Collaboration is paramount in my work ethos. Drawing from my experience as a Software Engineer, I've learned the immense value of a well-coordinated team. Whether it's optimizing database queries or architecting innovative solutions, the power of collective thinking is evident. My teaching role at university, where knowledge sharing is fundamental, has further underscored the significance of teamwork. I've excelled in teams that embrace collaboration, innovation, learning, and efficiency. These qualities are essential for adaptability as we collectively strive to achieve our goals.

resume.description: I am Passionate for competitive programming and solving programming problems with logical and analytical skills using data structure and algorithm knowledge.

experiences.bullets: Leveraged DDD principles to architect and develop the event display system for maps, reducing time-to-market for new features by ~10%.; Optimized database queries to deliver events smoothly and with ~25% reduction in response times, even under high data load.; Managed real-time event updates and display, resulting in a ~40% increase in precise events fetching and contributing to a significant rise in user retention and platform usage.

experiences.position: Lecturer at IICT, Shahjalal University of Science and Technology
experiences.bullets: My current research topics are I) Automated Program Repair, II) Software Testing, and III) Human-Computer Interaction.; Teaching undergraduate students some core subjects for Software Engineering like I) Discrete Mathematics, II) Algorithm Design & Analysis, III) Software Architecture & Design Patterns, IV) Software Verification & Validation.

Redesigned push notification API, boosting performance by ~60%.; Researched and developed a graph-based execution engine for complex calculation, reporting, and workflows, whichis under US government patent and able to save upto ~63% of client time.; Overhauled of front-end generic grid, eliminating memory leaks and streamlining development by ~40%.; Mentored junior inters in adopting best practices for efficient front-end architecture and coding techniques.; Architected a data pipeline for converting and transferring data with third parties, which now has over 20K monthly conversations with dozens of analysts and partners.; Transformed the legacy PowerBi frontend module, addressing memory leaks and significantly enhancing performance upto ~40% while ensuring smooth loading of graphs.; Architected real-time data sync, integrating 30 microservices for smooth chart updates on the dashboard.; Reduced sync time by ~45%, enhancing dashboard responsiveness, and boosting user engagement by ~40%.
